text: Stanislav Spartakovich Sharov is a basketball player from Russia. Sharov competed at the 2020 Summer Olympics.Stanislav SHAROV He was born on 29 May 1995.Stanislav Sharov == References == Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:3x3 basketball players Category:Guards (basketball) Category:Medalists at the 2020 Summer Olympics Category:Olympians for Russia Category:People from Kaliningrad Oblast Category:Russian basketball players
title: Stanislav Sharov
